title: Ear speaker malfunctioning - want replacement
content:
I purchased Google Pixel in 2017 in India. From then I my ear speaker was on low volume. Have no choice than to adjust with it. 

https://www.firstpost.com/tech/news-analysis/google-to-pay-pixel-pixel-xl-owners-up-to-500-if-their-phone-had-mic-or-speaker-issues-7154761.html

With the above link will I be also provided replacement?

Gandhi 
9676616161
